open parentheses fraction numerator a cubed b cubed over denominator a b squared end fraction close parentheses to the power of 4 equals open parentheses a to the power of 3 minus 1 end exponent. b to the power of 5 minus 2 end exponent close parentheses to the power of 4 equals open parentheses a squared b cubed close parentheses to the power of 4 equals a to the power of 8 b to the power of 12
